original_text: And they arose and took away the altars that were in Jerusalem, and all the altars for incense took they away, and cast them into the brook Kidron.
korean_text: 무리가 일어나 예루살렘에 있는 제단과 향단들을 모두 제거하여 기드론 시내에 던지고

sentences.original_text: and took away the altars that were in Jerusalem
and all the altars for incense took they away
and cast them into the brook Kidron
